Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes the capital investment jobs retention program
Summary: Establishes the capital investment jobs retention program offering a tax credit program for businesses within New York state that opt to make large capital investments and maintain certain job levels.
LawCode: Add Art 23 §§450 - 459, Ec Dev L; add §44, amd §§210-B, 606 & 1511, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the capital investment jobs retention program
